known_issues: Deployed app (Version 6) is not opening for the user.

existing_features.title: Update the app startup/auth gate to handle failures when loading the caller user profile so the UI never gets stuck on an indefinite loading screen. Specifically, when `useGetCallerUserProfile()` returns an error (e.g., backend unreachable / actor not available), render a clear error state with recovery actions instead of showing the “Setting up your profile...” spinner.

Add a safe client-side recovery path for cases where the PWA/service worker cache or a bad client state prevents the app from opening, by providing a “Hard reload” action in the startup error UI that clears relevant browser caches (including service worker caches if present) and reloads the page.

projectName: Fix app startup hang when user profile query fails (show error + recovery options)
